result.reason: The report only includes a title and a related-issue note, so reproducible steps and expected hotkey behavior are needed before implementation.
result.approach: Request exact hotkey details, current vs expected quick-connect behavior, and reproduction context, then adjust main-form shortcut routing accordingly.
